tool_description: this api is fully developed for asiandrama watching website
title: AsianDramas API with Watching Link

api_list.name: recently added
api_list.description:
recently added AsianDrama


change pageno for next page
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://asiandramas-api-with-watching-link.p.rapidapi.com/api/recently-added/page=1"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "asiandramas-api-with-watching-link.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
